field.description: Clinician responsible for the service record
field.label: Provider

field.name: PatientDesc
field.description: Subject patient for the service record
field.label: Patient

field.description: Tele-Care Guide from most recent treatment status
field.label: Tele-Care Guide

field.description: Health Coach from most recent treatment status
field.label: Health Coach

field.description: Flag to indicate that the questionnaire has changed since it was last submitted. The value is controlled by the UI.
field.label: Changed since last submit
1. {Do you/Does the patient} have any concerns today?
2. {Do you/Does the patient} have any concerns about any symptoms?
Please tell us how concerned you are about these symptoms
field.toolTip: For example: How is this different or worse than usual?

options: Swelling of ankles or feet or weight gain of 1-2kg in 1-2 days
Chest pain or tightness (more than five minutes of heart-type pain)
Significant coughing, wheezing or coloured phlegm
Feelings of weakness or unsteadiness, or any falls or collapses
Fever, shivering, infection, diarrhoea or urinary problems
Depression, mental health or behavioural issues
field.label: Symptoms

equals: Chest pain or tightness (more than five minutes of heart-type pain)

field.label: You have selected a potentially urgent medical issue. Do you wish to end the current call?
3. Today, how would you say that {your/the patient's} overall health is?
You have indicated that {you are/the patient is} in poor or very poor health. Do you wish to end the current call?
4. Since {you have/the patient has} come out of hospital, or our last call, have there been any changes in {your/their} health or healthcare?
Please tell us about these changes, including any services you needed
5. Since leaving hospital, or our last call, {have you/has the patient} had any changes in prescriptions, over the counter medications, alcohol or other drug use, including smoking?
Please tell us about these changes
6. If {you have/the patient has} been put on new medications, {do you/does the patient} understand what it is for and when to take it?
7. {Do you/Does the patient} have any concerns about {your/their} medications?
Please tell us about this
field.toolTip: For example: ran out of a medication, have not filled a prescription, cannot afford to pay, have side effects

field.label: 8. {Have you/Has the patient} any concerns or worries about the people who provide care for {you/them}, those closest to {you/them}, or worries about housing, finances or support?
9. {Are you/Is the patient} experiencing any bodily pain or discomfort today?
Please tell us about this
field.toolTip: For example: When did it start? Where is it? Is it unusual for you to have pain?

field.label: You have selected a potentially urgent medical issue. Do you wish to end the current call?

equals: Depression, mental health or behavioural issues

field.label: 10. Today, does {your/the patient's} health limit social activities?
field.toolTip: For example: going out, doing activities of enjoyment, visiting friends or close relatives

field.label: 11. Are {you/the patient}, {your/their} family and {your/their} caregivers coping with what has been happening in {your/their} life?
Please tell us as much as you wish, and if {you need/the patient needs} any help
12. {Do you/Does the patient} feel so down in the dumps nothing can cheer {you/them} up, or do {you/they} feel very nervous or worried?
Please tell us as much information as you wish
13. During the past month {have you/has the patient} often been bothered by feeling down, depressed or hopeless?
14. During the past month, {have you/has the patient} often been bothered by little interest or pleasure in doing things?
15. Is this something with which {you/they} would like help?
16. Since our last call {have you/has the patient} accessed or needed any services?

fieldsAndSections.subheading: Note: Community services includes physiotherapist, speech therapist, dietitian, pharmacist, community welfare, dentist, podiatrist
17. {Do you/Does the patient} feel {you/they} need any of the following services within the next few days? If so, is it available to {you/them}?

field.label: Tell us more about what you need that is not available
18. Since our last call, {have you/has the patient} had significant changes to people in {your/their} life?
19. {Do you/Does the patient} have any concerns regarding {your/their} home environment?
20. Are any of the following affecting {your/the patient's} day to day life?

options: Stay more or less the same
field.label: 21. Do you think {your/the patient's} overall health over the next few days will
22. Since our last call {have you/has the patient} taken all {your/their} medication?
23. {Are you/Is the patient} eating, drinking and going to the toilet as normal today?
24. In the past 24 hours {have you/has the patient} been outdoors?
25. In the past 24 hours {have you/has the patient} been physically active around the house for 30 minutes or more?
26. {Have you/Has the patient} been sleeping well?
27. Can you give a number between 1 and 10 to describe {your/the patient's} health today (1 being worst and 10 being the best)?
28. Is there anything else {you/the patient} would like to tell us? Please give as much information as you wish, including any positive things in {your/their} life since last call

options: Stay more or less the same
field.label: 29. As the caregiver, do you think your overall health over the next few days will
30. As the caregiver, do you have any concerns about yourself (personal, medical, social or other)?
31. As the caregiver, how would you rate your health today?
32. As the caregiver, do you need more help than currently have?
33. As the operator, do you have any concerns about the patient or the caregiver today?
Please write 1-2 sentences about today's call, regardless of the patient's responses. Include your impression of the patient's health today, be it negative or positive

columns.description: Question in the Questionnaire to which this issue relates. Should be a single number. (Previously could be multiple numbers.)
columns.label: Question

columns.description: Extract of the questions and answers to be displayed as a tool tip. Generated on the server.

field.description: Identifies the selected issue when creating a new problem and action
field.label: Selected issue ID
